Extract elements from many posts

extract_elements_bskyr.Rd

Extract elements from many posts

Extract author information from many posts

Extract text from many posts

Extract created at from many posts

Extract langs from many posts

Extract hashtags from many posts

Create post URL

Create post URL from many posts

Create post ID from many posts

Usage

extract_many_posts_elements_bskyr(posts)

extract_many_posts_author_infos_bskyr(posts)

extract_many_posts_text_bskyr(posts)

extract_many_posts_created_at_bskyr(posts)

extract_many_posts_langs_bskyr(posts)

extract_many_posts_hashtags_bskyr(posts)

create_post_url_bskyr(post_uri, author_did)

extract_many_posts_url_bskyr(posts)

extract_many_posts_id_bskyr(posts)

Arguments

posts

A list of post objects

post_uri

The URI of the post

author_did

The DID of the author

Value

A list of lists of elements

A list of lists with author handle, did, and created at

A list of texts

A list of created ats

A list of langs

A list of lists of hashtags

The URL of the post

A list of URLs

A list of IDs
